personalInfo.name: Seshasai Nagadevara
personalInfo.title: Senior Flutter Developer & Generative AI Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 7 years of hands-on experience specialising in full-stack mobile architecture and generative AI engineering. Expert in designing and deploying secure, scalable Flutter applications using SOLID principles and advanced state management patterns. Proven track record building autonomous AI agents, multi-agent systems(MAS), and LLM-powered workflows. Demonstrated leadership in architecting next-generation fintech solutions integrating cutting-edge AI technologies, including document processing, face recognition, and intelligent automation systems.

experiences.title: Lead Flutter App Developer & Generative AI Engineer
highlights: Architected and developed the AeonPay mobile banking application from inception based on SOLID principles and BLoC state management.
Implemented end-to-end security protocols (ECDH, HMAC, AES-GCM) to protect sensitive financial data.
Innovated development lifecycle by creating an autonomous AI multi-agent system (LightHouse) increasing productivity by 40%.
Developed a secure backend server using Modal Context Protocol (MCP) for digital onboarding workflows.
Architected gRPC-based app-to-server API communication for high-performance image transfer and real-time data synchronisation in banking workflows
Built a streamlined 2-step digital onboarding app, reducing customer friction.
Implemented advanced security checks including document authenticity and face liveness detection.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Engineered core features for the Canara HSBC Insurance application across mobile and web platforms ensuring cross-platform consistency.
Architected application state management using Getx framework.
Developed and maintained internal Flutter component libraries, reducing development time by 30%.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed and maintained key features for the high-traffic HDFC Securities trading application.
Implemented BLoC state management framework for complex financial application states.

experiences.title: Flutter Developer & Founding Member
highlights: Operated as a full-time freelance developer and core founding member, managing complete project lifecycles.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
highlights: Contributed to core development of BHIM UPI, India's national digital payment platform.

skills.name: Generative AI
skills.description: LangChain, Google ADK,A2A Protocol, OpenAI Agent SDK, GenKit, n8n, Make.com, MCProtocol, FastMCP, Prompt Engineering.

skills.name: Flutter & Mobile
skills.description: Cross-Platform (iOS, Android, Web, Desktop), BLoC, Getx, SOLID, MVVM, Platform Channels

skills.name: Computer Vision
skills.description: Deep Learning-CNN, Tensorflow, OpenCV, YOLO v11, Object Detection, Pose Estimation.

skills.name: Python & Backend
skills.description: FastAPI, REST APIs, gRPC, Telegram Bot API, Firebase, Podman

certificates.name: Google-Kaggle Agents Intensive Capstone Certificate
certificates.description: Earned the 5-Day AI Agents Intensive Course with Google Badge and capstone certificate.

certificates.name: BLR AI Hackday - Agentic Workflow & Vibe Coding Web App
certificates.description: Built agentic workflow and web app using Make.com, Lovable, and Antigravity at #BLRAIHACKDAY. Demonstrated 'Vibe Coding' paradigm where imagination replaces traditional syntax, exploring the future of no-code agentic workflows and rapid AI application development.

certificates.name: Project ASTRA - AI Navigation Assistant
certificates.description: AI Navigation Assistant for DeafBlind | Flutter, Cactus SDK, On-Device AI — Developed a 100% offline mobile app using dual AI models (LFM2-VL for vision, Qwen3 for tool calling) that analyses camera recordings and provides real-time environmental awareness through Morse code haptics, TTS voice guidance, and hardware volume button control. Built for Cactus X Nothing X HuggingFace Hackathon with multi-frame video analysis to detect moving hazards and a local agent system for intelligent decision-making.

certificates.name: n8n Certified Level 2 Flowgrammer
certificates.description: Earned the 5-Day AI Agents Intensive Course with Google Badge and capstone certificate.

apps.name: Scaffolder desktop Application
apps.description: GUI for automating Flutter project setup.

apps.name: Canara HSBC Insurance Application
apps.description: Insurance application serving thousands of users.

projects.title: LightHouse — Autonomous AI Multi-Agent System for Code Intelligence
projects.description: An advanced multi-agent platform leveraging Google ADK, A2A communication, and MCP protocols to automate code analysis, documentation generation, and security audits. Enhanced developer productivity by 40% through context-aware code insights and architecture extraction.

projects.title: AI-Powered Onboarding MCP Server — Autonomous AI Backend Orchestrator
projects.description: Secure Modal Context Protocol (MCP) backend server coordinating digital onboarding workflows with AI services (Document OCR, Face Liveness, Face Match) via Claude 4.5 LLM integration. Utilizes FastMCP, Google ADK, and advanced context engineering for enterprise financial security.

projects.title: Scaffolder — Flutter Project Automation Desktop Tool
projects.description: Cross-platform desktop application (Windows/macOS) that automates Flutter project setup via a GUI, standardizing architecture and boilerplate. Uses BLoC-driven state management and Dart process commands to generate new projects, features, and modules, reducing initial setup time by up to 80%.

projects.title: Project ASTRA — On-Device AI Navigation Assistant for DeafBlind
projects.description: Accessibility-focused Flutter app using dual on-device AI models (LFM2-VL for vision, Qwen3 for local tool-calling) to provide real-time environmental awareness for DeafBlind users. Performs multi-frame video analysis to detect moving hazards and uses a local agent system to drive Morse code haptics, TTS guidance, and hardware button controls, operating 100% offline for reliable, private navigation support.

projects.title: Apple Satellite Companion App — BLE-based iPhone Mirror for Android
projects.description: Developed an Android companion app using BLE to mirror iPhone notifications and calls on Android, improving user safety while riding. Engineered using Flutter isolates for background execution and Firebase for messaging and crash analytics.

projects.title: LinkedIn Content Automation Agent — Autonomous Social Workflow Orchestrator
projects.description: Certified n8n Level 2 Flowgrammer project automating the entire LinkedIn content lifecycle. Fetches topics from Google Sheets, generates and summarizes posts via LLM APIs, creates visuals, posts automatically on LinkedIn, and updates Google Sheets for tracking.

projects.title: Deepfake Face Detection AI Agent with Vision–Language Pipeline
projects.description: Autonomous multi-stage detection pipeline integrating OpenCV artifact analysis, fine-tuned Vision–Language Model (VLM), and OpenAI-based verification. Trained on large-scale datasets achieving 89% validation accuracy, orchestrated via OpenAI Agent SDK and LangChain for workflow automation.

projects.title: EDIT Digital Onboarding Flutter App — Secure Identity Platform
projects.description: Streamlined 2-step customer onboarding app with multi-layered anti-fraud security: document authenticity verification (photocopy/screen replay/portrait substitution) and active/passive face liveness detection. Significantly reduces abandonment through optimized UX and robust validation.

projects.title: Onboarding Federated Flutter Plugin — Native Cross-Platform Integration
projects.description: Published private federated plugin for consistent document/face capture across app ecosystem. Architected with MVVM Kotlin modules for Android, delivering scalable native performance while maintaining unified Flutter UI/UX and security standards.

projects.title: Document Type Identification API — YOLOv11 Document AI Classifier
projects.description: End-to-end ML pipeline for automated classification of government onboarding documents such as passports and ID proofs. Utilized YOLOv11 with Label Studio for annotation and GPU-accelerated training on Google Colab, achieving 95%+ accuracy in production scenarios.

projects.title: XARK - Construction Blueprint Analysis — Multimodal Generative AI for Architecture
projects.description: Cross-platform Flutter application leveraging Gemini Multimodal and GenKit for blueprint interpretation and Vastu Shastra-based improvement recommendations. Implements advanced prompt engineering for structured output generation and action-oriented insights.

projects.title: Arabic–English Transliteration Agent — High-Accuracy Language Service
projects.description: FastAPI-based transliteration microservice using GPT-4o-mini and LangChain for multilingual OCR data with context-aware accuracy. Applied advanced prompt engineering and chain-of-thought reasoning for robust linguistic performance.

projects.title: Safe Weapon Use Detection — Real-Time Pose and Context Analysis System
projects.description: Developed a real-time CV system combining YOLO-based weapon detection with body pose estimation to assess usage safety. Generates alerts based on contextual threat patterns for surveillance or controlled environments.

projects.title: SmartFace Attendance Platform — Multi-Stream Real-Time Recognition System
projects.description: High-performance attendance system processing multiple concurrent camera feeds for identity verification and unknown-person alerts. Designed modular architecture for efficient scalability and deployment.

projects.title: AI Timesheet Telegram Agent — Multilingual Intent Parser for Workflow Automation
projects.description: Conversational AI agent parsing multilingual text (including Telugu) into structured JSON for timesheet entry automation. Built using LangChain, Claude LLM, and Telegram Bot API with integrated tool-calling for robust intent extraction.

projects.title: AI Virtual Indian Music Instruments — Real-Time Gesture-to-Music Generator
projects.description: Interactive computer vision app that converts hand and finger gestures into musical notes simulating Indian instruments like Tabla and Veena. Implemented gesture recognition via MediaPipe and OpenCV for latency-free music synthesis.

projects.title: IoT Rocket Ground Station — Hardware-in-the-Loop Control System
projects.description: Developed an IoT-enabled Flutter app interfaced with ESP8266 microcontroller for sending and monitoring rocket launch commands via Bluetooth. Designed real-time telemetry dashboard for hardware-in-the-loop operations.

achievements: Winner of state level cyber security hackathon
